description: Identify the main concern with the highest number of young people contacting Childline.
Determine the total number of young people who contacted Childline about family relationships.
Calculate the average number of young people contacting Childline across all main concerns.
Find any main concern that has a significantly lower number of young people compared to others.
Identify if there is a correlation between the type of concern and the number of young people contacting Childline.
Which main concerns have more than 20,000 young people contacting Childline?
Rank the main concerns from the highest to the lowest number of young people contacting Childline.
Determine the range of the number of young people contacting Childline across all main concerns.
What percentage of the main concerns have more than 15,000 young people contacting Childline?
Identify any clusters of main concerns with similar numbers of young people contacting Childline.
